title: GemachDAO (GitHub Organization): On-Chain Agent Infrastructure, Governance Contracts, and the Gemach D.A.T.A. I Research Lineage (Founding Proof: Create gemach.sol, 2021-06-13)
description: GemachDAO is the public GitHub organization anchoring Gemach DAO’s open technical surface area for decentralized governance and on-chain agent infrastructure. This Zenodo deposit preserves a citable snapshot of organization-level repositories and research-linked artifacts, including provenance evidence for the digital founding marker (commit: “Create gemach.sol”, authored by kingassune, 2021-06-13) and research linkage to the arXiv preprint “Incentivized Symbiosis: A Paradigm for Human-Agent Coevolution” (arXiv:2412.06855), indexed by the NASA/Harvard Astrophysics Data System (ADS). ADS is operated by the Smithsonian Astrophysical Observatory under NASA Cooperative Agreement 80NSSC21M0056.
